snippet: Profit-sharing and employee ownership can reduce inequality.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Professors Joseph R Blasi, Richard B Freeman and Douglas L Kruse calls for revival of profit-sharing and employee ownership in United States in effort to fight income inequality; says idea needs more powerful supporters from business and politics and praises Hillary Rodham Clinton, for her proposal for two-year tax credit to encourage profit-sharing.

byline.original: By JOSEPH R. BLASI, RICHARD B. FREEMAN and DOUGLAS L. KRUSE

lead_paragraph: Profit-sharing and employee ownership can reduce inequality.

headline.print_headline: Capitalism for the Rest of Us
